# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

<!-- Desired comment format -->

<!-- run a: false -->

<!-- run b: [ "error", 10 ] -->

<!-- run c: null -->

```javascript
var path = require( 'path' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

<!-- Sloppy comments -->

<!--    run    foo: "bar"     -->

<!--   run   beep: true  -->

<!--              run    boop:2     -->

```javascript
var p = path.posix.join( 'foo', 'bar' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

</section>

<!-- /.notes -->

<!-- run c:null -->

```javascript
var x = 3.14;
```

</section>
